name: Kangaroo
tagline: Cloud-based android mobile phone contact backup system. Secures your contacts and get from anywhere.
body:
### Welcome to Kangaroo Android App.
This is the small app with great functionality. This app helps to backup 
phone contacts to cloud and get them back at any time anywhere.

Mobile lost?, No problem!!!. Wait...Buy another mobile and install this app and login
with your credentials and get contact back.


Want Contribute?
```
$ git clone https://github.com/mehikmat/Kangaroo
$ cd Kangaroo
$ git fetch origin
```
And send a pull request.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this App? 
Open an issue https://github.com/mehikmat/Kangaroo/issues  and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
